description: Pick a follower. Create an Ephemeral copy of it in hand.
Nexus Strike: Plant a Mysterious Portal in the top 4 cards of your deck.
Deal 1 to a unit. If you have 4+ allies, deal 2 instead.
Daybreak: Give Daybreak allies +1|+1 this round. Nightfall: Grant Nightfall allies +1|+0.
None
Round End: Grant allies in play and in hand +1|+1. Empowered 5: Elusive, Lifesteal, and Overwhelm.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Spawn 2. Then, if your strongest Tentacle has 12+ Power, create a Nagakabouros' Tantrum in hand.
Play: Recall an ally to summon an Ephemeral copy of it. Countdown 3: Summon another Ephemeral copy of it.
Deal 2 to ALL units.
Allegiance: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and Overwhelm.
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
Attack: Grant me Power equal to the total Power of all allies.
When you draw or create me in hand or each Round Start: while I'm in hand, transform me into a random 6+ cost spell.
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck. Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1. For each ally that died this round, summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
When I'm summoned, draw 1. If you drew a landmark, repeat this effect.
Round Start: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Then, if I've seen allies from 10 regions, win the game.
Play: Give an ally Barrier this round and draw a Shen. Allies with Barrier have Double Attack.
When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
When you slay a unit, reduce the cost of the next Darkin Unit you play by 1.
For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
None
Attack: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand and grant it Fleeting.
When I'm summoned, draw a Yasuo and Stun the strongest enemy. When you gain the attack token, Stun the strongest enemy.
Each round, the first time another ally dies, draw 1.
When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
Flow: I cost 2 less. Recall a unit or landmark. If it has any attachments, destroy them first.
Grant an enemy Vulnerable. If it's already Vulnerable, the strongest ally starts a free attack challenging it.
Play: Manifest a follower that has a different subtype than allies in play.
Last Breath: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
Create an Icathian Mirage in hand that costs 0 this round, or create a Golden Spatula in hand.
Round End: If you played a spell on me this round, I strike the weakest enemy.
None
Kill a unit, then revive it.
When I am summoned, summon a Ghastly Band. Round Start: If you have the attack token, summon a Ghastly Band.
When an ally with Fury kills a unit, grant it an additional +1|+1.
When an ally with an attachment attacks, grant that attachment +1|+0.
Transform a unit into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it.
None
When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you Behold a Nightfall card.
